pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of correspondence, newspaper clippings, sheet music (mostly of songs sung by Valeria), radio scripts, and financial reports of the Polish War Relief Committee of Boston, ca. 1944. From 1937-1944 Nurczynski produced Echoes of Poland. Also includes correspondence and photographs of Alexandra J. Jaskolski and papers of Karol Jaskolski.
